Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: This is the southeast corner of the ground floor of the Tower Castle.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway turns at this point, and continues to the north and to the southwest. The southern side of the castle on the ground floor is used mostly by the troops, while the commanders generally reside on the north side of the castle. Heavy battle equipment is in storage along the hall.
